name: .CPDX File Extension
summary: Learn about .CPDX files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open CPDX files with Captivate Draft in iOS. However, Adobe ceased the development of the application. You can also open CPDX files with Captivate by selecting File → New Project → Project from Adobe Captivate Draft..., navigating to the CPDX file, then clicking Open.
NOTE: Only Captivate 9 and later support CPDX files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
